Package example.akismet

Interface Summary
AkismetClient Akismet Client for the Akismet API documentation.
AkismetClientFactoryMBean MBean for an AkismetClientFactory.
 

Class Summary
AkismetClientFactory Factory to create Akismet clients.
AkismetClientFactoryMBeanImpl MBean implementation for AkismetClientFactoryMBean.
AkismetClientImpl A Akismet REST (API version 1.1) implementation.
AkismetKeyPolicy Policy to trim akismet key.
OAkismetKeyVerificationPolicyWidget Widget for verification of akismet keys.
 

Exception Summary
AkismetException Thrown when a Akismet call fails (for example when a HTTP connection fails).
AkismetTooManyConnectionsException Thrown when too many Akismet clients try to access the Akismet servers at the same time.
